Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.network.socket

Class SocketClientNetManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.network.socket.SocketClientNetManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientNetManager, Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class SocketClientNetManager extends Object implements ClientNetManager
NetManager implementation which uses a protocol built on top of raw TCP sockets
